pages.title: Repairing Totems
pages.text: Passive totems and upgraded active totems can break. Luckily, they can also be repaired. In a smithing table netherite active totems can be repaired for an emerald, and passive totems can be repaired for a diamond. Passive totems will never break, much like the Elytra they will go into a broken state instead of
disappearing completely. $(l)Active netherite totems, however, will break permanently$() if not repaired.
